author: jbowden@thehill.com (John Bowden)
title: 'Probable' coronavirus deaths now included in CDC totals
description: The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) announced this week that it would begin including "probable" cases of the coronavirus in its count of the disease's cases in the U.S.Citing a statement by the Council for State and...
content:
The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) announced this week that it would begin including "probable" cases of the coronavirus in its count of the disease's cases in the U.S.
Citing a statement by the Council for State and Territorial Epidemiolog… [+1445 chars]
